Job Responsibility
Manage and supervise the daily activities of the technical team.
Ensures that Planned Preventative Maintenance tasks are carried out in accordance with the 
schedule, frequency and task lists and provide reports on any works required thereafter. 
Promotes a safe work environment and proper use of Personal Protective Equipment.
Experience of safe working practices, risk assessments, method statement and permit to work 
system. 
Respond to all Reactive Maintenance within the specified service and operational. Oversees and 
carries out Maintenance and repair of equipment.
Good Understanding of Electrical Drawing,  Planning of Project, Operation & Maintenance,
Short Circuit & Voltage drop Calculation at each level of Distribution. 
Experience of Power & Lighting Distribution system, MDB, SMDB, DB, Capacitor Bank Panel, 
street lighting UPS, Generator set.
Experienced in A/C system and control, Packages, Spilt units, Pumps, HVAC system i.e. AHU, 
FAHU, FCU and cooling tower. 
Having knowledge for Plumbing,  firefighting and civil Maintenance.
Good Understanding of Microsoft office (Word, Excel, Power point, Outlook….)
Summary of Qualification
10+2 passed (1992)
I.T.I in Electrician pass out (1995)
DIPLOMA in Electrical Engineering (2006)
